scripts.deploy:docker: yarn mustache config/docker.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn graph deploy venusprotocol/crosschain-governance --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 --node http://graph-node:8020/
scripts.deploy:sepolia: yarn mustache config/sepolia.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn graph deploy venusprotocol/crosschain-governance --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:ethereum: yarn mustache config/ethereum.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn graph deploy venusprotocol/crosschain-governance --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.prepare:sepolia: yarn mustache config/sepolia.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn mustache config/sepolia.json src/constants/config-template > src/constants/config.ts
scripts.prepare:ethereum: yarn mustache config/ethereum.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn mustache config/ethereum.json src/constants/config-template > src/constants/config.ts
